Name: Valentino
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A variation on the Negroni . More gin and less liqueur and vermouth make for an unusual bittersweet Martini.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in February 1999 by Gary "gaz" Regan and published in his 2001 book, The Joy of Mixology .
Nutrition: One serving of Valentino contains 190 calories
